March 15, 2023

U.S. Wind Turbine Analysis

  • Data Analytics Immersive Program
  • General Assembly, Bahrain
  • Team: Haleema Esam, Ameera Salman, Jubran AlTaitoon, Khulood Aloun & Zahra Alkhawaja
  • Tools:
    • Analysis: Jupyter Notebook, Python â€“ Pandas, Numpy, Seaborn and Plotly and Tableau
    • Collaboration: Trello and Slack
    • Presentation: PowerPoint

This project deployed a rapid, three-day data sprint using Agile methodology to deliver actionable market entry recommendations for an investor in the wind power sector. We executed a focused workflow, encompassing data processing, analysis, targeted research, and presentation development, with daily investor and team check-ins to ensure alignment and timely delivery of strategic insights.

Data Source:

  • The U.S. Wind Turbine Database
  • U.S. Energy Information Administration Database
